name: POSTAL: RUN! - Full Edition
description:
ORIGINAL LOGO "POSTAL: RUN! - Full Edition":

PIXEL LOGO "POSTAL: RUN! - Full Edition":

INCLUDES:
POSTAL: RUN! version 1.1.0
POSTAL: RUN! SOUNDTRACK + Bonus Covers
ArtBook of POSTAL: RUN!
POSTAL font (It is recommended to install to correctly display the text in the game)

(All bonuses are in the folder with the installed game)

DESCRIPTION:

Full Edition of a runner developed by The Forge of the Games team.

Runner created based on the popular video game series "POSTAL".

Run, beat the record, jump and try to cope with a gradually gaining speed! All this and much more awaits you in "POSTAL: RUN!".

Developer: The Forge of the Games
Publisher: The Forge of the Games

ARTBOOK: (download artbook in PDF format)

TRACKLIST: (Soundtracks /Music that is used in the game "POSTAL: RUN!" All music in this tracklist/playlist/game belongs to Stands With Fists and their labels/record companies.)
Click on this link or on the image below to listen to the soundtrack on Spotify, Apple Music, VK Music!

Credit's:

Development: Pavel Ermakov

Sprites: Pavel Alishevsky

Game Design: Daniel Kolechkin
